Gracefield Island, nke a na-akpọkwa The Phoenix, bụ obodo ọhụrụ dị hekta otu narị nke e kere site na iweghachite ala site na Lagos Lagoon
Ọ bụ njikọ aka n'etiti Gravitas Investments Limited (ndị mmepe obodo) na Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti.

Gracefield Island bụ obodo mepụtara site na mkpocha nke otu narị hekta site na Lagos Lagoon ma na-atụ anya na ọ ga-anabata mmadụ puku iri na puku iri abụọ na ise. Ọrụ ahụ, njikọ aka n'etiti Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti na Gravitas Investments Limited, dị na njedebe nke Chevron Drive, Lagos, ma jikọọ ya na Lekki site n'okporo ụzọ awara awara nke ya.
Gọọmentị steeti Lagos kwadoro mmepe nke Gracefield Island na 2016.

Ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ama ama nwere ọnụnọ na Gracefield Island bụ: Lafarge, Aspin, 9Mobile, Chevron Staff Coop, Zutari nke South Africa, Samsson Group nke Dubai, HealthCare Outpost.
Onye guzobere na Chief Executive nke Gracefield Island bụ Maazị Olufemi Babalola na Onye isi oche bụ Dr
Nu'uman Barau Danbatta, OFR, na Architect Ferdinand Agu, OFR
Peter Stephenson OBE, Leke Ojulari na Adetokunbo Adeyemo dị ka ndị nduzi.

N'afọ 2016, a kọrọ na Van_Oord, ụlọ ọrụ injinia ụgbọ mmiri na-arụ ọrụ n'akụkụ mkpocha ala nke ọrụ ahụ weghachitere ihe dị ka hekta iri atọ nke ala na ịdị elu nke mita 1.8. Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2017, ndị mmepe obodo ahụ kpughere ụlọ ọrụ ọfịs ya fọrọ nke nta ka ọ rụchaa.

A na-eme atụmatụ ka ọ bụrụ obodo na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke nwere ebe a na-akwụ ụgwọ ọha na eze maka ụgbọala eletrik, ụzọ ịnyịnya ígwè a raara nye na okporo ụzọ ndị na-agafe agafe iji gbaa ịnyịnya ígwè na ịga ije ume dị ka ụzọ dị mma maka ịgagharị.
Ụlọ ọrụ ndị nọ na Gracefield Island gụnyere Lafarge, 9Mobile, na HealthCare Outpost
9Mobile bụ onye na-enye ọrụ nkwukọrịta Fibre na agwaetiti ahụ.
